briefTitle: Extension Study Assessing Long Term Safety and Efficacy of IONIS-TTR Rx in Familial Amyloid Polyneuropathy (FAP)
officialTitle: An Open-Label Extension Study to Assess the Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of ISIS 420915 in Patients With Familial Amyloid Polyneuropathy (FAP)
summary: This study evaluates the safety and tolerability of extended dosing with IONIS-TTR Rx in patients with Familial Amyloid Polyneuropathy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs), Serious TEAEs, and TEAEs Related to Study Drug
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose of study drug up to 3 months post treatment period of 260 weeks (Up to approximately 272 weeks)
